author: Reuters Editorial
title: French coronavirus cases rise to 130: public health chief
description: France has 130 confirmed cases of coronavirus, the head of the public health service, Jerome Salomon, said on Sunday, raising the count from 100 a day earlier.
content:
PARIS (Reuters) - France has 130 confirmed cases of coronavirus, the head of the public health service, Jerome Salomon, said on Sunday, raising the count from 100 a day earlier. 
Reporting by Leigh Thomas; Editing by Andrew Heavens
